bibliography:

Noûs, 8(3): 211–31.

Adams, Robert Merrihew, 1994 Leibniz: Determinist,
Theist, Idealist, Oxford: Oxford University Press.

Possibles,” Studia Leibnitiana, 5: 163–77.

Brown, Gregory, 1987. “Compossibility, Harmony, and

Ishiguro, Hidé, 1990. Leibniz's Philosophy of
